name: Ext_R5_NutritionOrder_en_ad_schedule
title: Cross-version Extension for R5.NutritionOrder.enteralFormula.administration.schedule for use in FHIR R4B
description: This cross-version extension represents NutritionOrder.enteralFormula.administration.schedule from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/NutritionOrder|5.0.0 for use in FHIR R4B.

element.short: Scheduling information for enteral formula products
element.definition: Schedule information for an enteral formula.
element.comment: `NutritionOrder.enteralFormula.administration.schedule` maps to R4B `NutritionOrder.enteralFormula.administration.schedule`. Has no type mapping So is mapped as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget.

element.definition: The time period and frequency at which the enteral formula should be given.  The enteral formula should be given for the combination of all schedules if more than one schedule is present.
element.comment: `NutritionOrder.enteralFormula.administration.schedule` maps to R4B `NutritionOrder.enteralFormula.administration.schedule`. Has no type mapping So is mapped as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget.

element.definition: The time period and frequency at which the enteral formula should be given.  The enteral formula should be given for the combination of all schedules if more than one schedule is present.
element.comment: `NutritionOrder.enteralFormula.administration.schedule` maps to R4B `NutritionOrder.enteralFormula.administration.schedule`. Has no type mapping So is mapped as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget.

element.definition: Indicates whether the enteral formula is only taken when needed within a specific dosing schedule.
element.comment: `NutritionOrder.enteralFormula.administration.schedule` maps to R4B `NutritionOrder.enteralFormula.administration.schedule`. Has no type mapping So is mapped as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget.

element.definition: Indicates whether the enteral formula is only taken when needed within a specific dosing schedule.
element.comment: `NutritionOrder.enteralFormula.administration.schedule` maps to R4B `NutritionOrder.enteralFormula.administration.schedule`. Has no type mapping So is mapped as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget.

element.definition: Indicates whether the enteral formula is only taken based on a precondition for taking the enteral formula.
element.comment: `NutritionOrder.enteralFormula.administration.schedule` maps to R4B `NutritionOrder.enteralFormula.administration.schedule`. Has no type mapping So is mapped as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget.

element.definition: Indicates whether the enteral formula is only taken based on a precondition for taking the enteral formula.
element.comment: `NutritionOrder.enteralFormula.administration.schedule` maps to R4B `NutritionOrder.enteralFormula.administration.schedule`. Has no type mapping So is mapped as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget.

binding.description: A coded concept identifying the precondition that should be met or evaluated prior to       consuming an enteral formula.
